node.content:
How does WordPress work as a Learning Management System? What are the challenges in setting it up for this purpose? What are the best practices, great plugins, and most practical ways to use WordPress as an LMS? We (try) to answer those questions this week.

For this episode, we are joined by WPCampus members @darichardson, @kimshivler, @ShantaDotCa, @jugoretz, and @mstrjr.
